title: Readout of President Obama's call to Greek Prime Minister Papandreou | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 02, 2010

 



Readout of President Obama's call to Greek Prime Minister Papandreou




"President Obama spoke with Prime Minister Papandreou this afternoon. He welcomed the ambitious reform program announced by the Greek authorities, as well as the significant support that was agreed to by the IMF and Eurozone members. The two leaders discussed the importance of implementation going forward.
